column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cafe Ba Ba Reba is a unique and fun spot for Spanish tapas. Great for large groups that like to share food and try new flavors. I loved their Brussels sprout salad
column2: bacon wrapped dates and their sangrias. Reasonably priced and very lively restaurant so a good place to go out with friends on a weekend night. There are not that many tapas places in the city but this one is certainly the best
